name: C. Vanya and Exams
statement:
Vanya wants to pass exams and get the academic scholarship. He will get
the scholarship if the average grade mark for all the exams is at least
. The exam grade cannot exceed . Vanya has passed the exams and got
grade for the -th exam. To increase the grade for the -th exam by 1
point, Vanya must write essays. He can raise the exam grade multiple
times.What is the minimum number of essays that Vanya needs to write to
get scholarship?
editorial:
